section.section: The Secretary shall prepare for the Governor a draft of the proposed budget.

The draft shall:
be comprehensive;
eliminate duplication and conflict; and
include each item that the Governor is required by law to include in a proposed budget.

text.section: The Secretary shall include in the draft items for capital improvements.

The Secretary may specify:
the form to be used by a unit of the Executive Branch of the State government or a private entity to request an appropriation from the State;
information that must be submitted with the form; and
the time for submission of the form.
